### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(${DKONLINE}/Libs/tidy-html5-5.0.0.zip tidy-html5-5.0.0)
DKSET(TIDY ${3RDPARTY}/tidy-html5-5.0.0)


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${TIDY})
DKINCLUDE(${TIDY}/include)
DKINCLUDE(${TIDY}/${OS})
ANDROID_INCLUDE(${TIDY}/${OS}/$(BUILD_TYPE)/jni)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/Debug/tidy.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/Release/tidy.lib)
APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libtidy.a)
APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libtidy.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/Debug/libtidy.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/Release/libtidy.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libtidy.a)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${TIDY}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libtidy.a)


### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${TIDY}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /I${ZLIB}/${OS}" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${TIDY})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy.sln tidy)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy.sln tidy)

DKSETPATH(${TIDY}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${X64GENERATOR} "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /DWIN64 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${TIDY})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy.sln tidy)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy.sln tidy)

DKSETPATH(${TIDY}/${OS})
MAC_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 ${TIDY})
MAC_XCODE_DEBUG(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy)
MAC_XCODE_RELEASE(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy)

DKSETPATH(${TIDY}/${OS})
IOS_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS ${TIDY})
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy)

DKSETPATH(${TIDY}/${OS})
IOSSIM_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=SIMULATOR64 ${TIDY})
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(tidy-html5-5.0.0 tidy)

DKSETPATH(${TIDY}/${OS}/Debug)
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG ${TIDY})
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(make tidy)

DKSETPATH(${TIDY}/${OS}/Release)
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE ${TIDY})
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(make tidy)

ANDROID_NDK_DEBUG(tidy-html5-5.0.0b)
ANDROID_NDK_RELEASE(tidy-html5-5.0.0)
